Hello everyone!

We are facing issue on Email send with workflow.
The method we are using is.
1-> Added hidden form in Post details page and added post id on that hidden field.
2-> When some user comes in and click on send me this blog post and enter Email. [From will submit post_id and user_email_ID]
3-> Here workflow will trigger and grab all the form data and send Email to user.
4-> Issue we are facing here is. We need that post_id but when workflow triggers it overwrite Email's ID and messing up all the data.
